segments_with_images.segment_text: In the ancient Himalayas, Arjun, a fiery young student, seeks mastery from the reclusive Rishi Vishwamitra.  He yearns for power, believing it will bring fulfillment.

images.original_prompt: Wide shot of majestic Himalayan peaks at sunrise, a lone figure (Arjun) small against the vast landscape,  walking towards a hidden ashram nestled amongst the trees., Epic, spiritual, Himalayan landscape with a focus on light and shadow to highlight emotional shifts., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Wide shot of majestic Himalayan peaks at sunrise, professional quality, good lighting
images.visual_focus: Arjun's ambition and the scale of his journey

segments_with_images.segment_text:
Arjun: Rishi, I seek your wisdom!  I will master your teachings, no matter the cost!
Vishwamitra: (calmly)  Power is a double-edged sword, Arjun.  Seek wisdom first, and power will follow.

images.original_prompt: Close-up on Arjun's determined face, then a slow pan to reveal Rishi Vishwamitra seated serenely, his eyes filled with ancient wisdom., Epic, spiritual, Himalayan landscape with a focus on light and shadow to highlight emotional shifts., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Close-up on Arjun's determined face, professional quality, cinematic lighting
images.visual_focus: The contrast between Arjun's impatience and Vishwamitra's serenity

segments_with_images.segment_text: Years passed in rigorous training. Arjun pushed his limits, sometimes even defying his guru's guidance, his impatience growing.

images.original_prompt: Montage of training scenes: Arjun meditating in harsh conditions, practicing intense physical exercises, struggling with difficult spells; time-lapses and fast cuts highlighting the passage of time., Epic, spiritual, Himalayan landscape with a focus on light and shadow to highlight emotional shifts., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Montage of training scenes: Arjun meditating in harsh conditions, struggling with difficult spells; time-lapses and fast cuts highlighting the passage of time., professional quality
images.visual_focus: The demanding nature of the training, and Arjun's struggle

segments_with_images.segment_text:
Arjun: (Frustrated)  I demand more power, Rishi! Your methods are too slow!
Vishwamitra: (Softly)  True power comes from within, Arjun. It's not a gift to be demanded, but a treasure to be discovered.

images.original_prompt: Close-up on Arjun's angry face, then a slow zoom out to show Rishi Vishwamitra with a look of understanding but firmness., Epic, spiritual, Himalayan landscape with a focus on light and shadow to highlight emotional shifts., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Close-up on Arjun's angry face, professional quality, natural lighting
images.visual_focus: The emotional tension between teacher and student

segments_with_images.segment_text: That night, Arjun saw a vision: Devi Saraswati, radiating divine light, revealed the true meaning of knowledge—self-awareness and compassion.

images.original_prompt: Arjun meditating, a vision of Devi Saraswati appearing before him, radiating ethereal light; emphasis on serene, spiritual imagery., Epic, spiritual, Himalayan landscape with a focus on light and shadow to highlight emotional shifts., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Arjun meditating, professional quality, natural lighting

segments_with_images.segment_text: Arjun:  Rishi, I understand. True power lies in understanding, not just in wielding it.

images.original_prompt: Arjun kneeling before Vishwamitra, now with humility and respect, the Himalayan backdrop suggesting a sense of peace., Epic, spiritual, Himalayan landscape with a focus on light and shadow to highlight emotional shifts., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Arjun kneeling before Vishwamitra, professional quality, cinematic lighting
